item.title: 肯尼亚在总统美国之行中获得价值 36 亿美元的高速公路协议
item.description: 肯尼亚国家公路局与 Everstrong Capital LLC 公司签署了一项价值 36 亿美元的协议，将修建一条连接肯尼亚两个最大城市的高速公路，这是威廉-鲁托总统访美期间预计宣布的几项投资交易之一。【原文：The Kenya National Highways Authority signed a $3.6 billion agreement with Everstrong Capital LLC to build an expressway linking the nation’s two largest cities, one of several investment deals expected to be announced during President William Ruto’s US visit.】

item.title: 耶伦呼吁联合起来应对中国工业产能过剩问题
item.description: 美国财政部长珍妮特-耶伦（Janet Yellen）表示，美国和欧洲必须针对中国工业产能过剩问题结成明确的统一战线，她还就中国宏观经济失衡对全球的影响发出了警告。【原文：Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen said it’s critical for the US and Europe to present a clear and united front against Chinese industrial overcapacity, as she warned of the global impact of Beijing’s macroeconomic imbalances.】

item.title: 耶伦批评以色列扣留巴勒斯坦收入的举动
item.description: 美国财政部长珍妮特-耶伦（Janet Yellen）批评以色列说它将扣留代表巴勒斯坦权力机构征收的收入，并警告以色列不要切断巴勒斯坦贷款人与以色列代理银行的联系。【原文：US Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen criticized Israel for saying it will hold back revenues collected on behalf of the Palestinian Authority, and warned it against cutting Palestinian lenders off from their Israeli correspondent banks.】

item.title: 欧盟因蒙迪艾尔限制跨境销售罚款 3.375 亿欧元
item.description: 欧盟反垄断监督机构称，美国蒙代尔兹国际公司（Mondelez International Inc.【原文：Mondelez International Inc. was fined €337.5 million ($366 million) after European Union antitrust watchdogs said the US company illegally thwarted cut-price cross-border sales of its chocolate, cookies and coffee.】

item.title: 里拉是博雅策略师的最爱，回报率接近 10
item.description: 美国银行（Bank of America Corp.）的策略师认为，土耳其里拉是东欧、中东和非洲货币中的最佳选择。【原文：The Turkish lira is the best bet among currencies in eastern Europe, Middle East and African, according to Bank of America Corp. strategists, who see the potential for almost 10% returns with a carry trade strategy.】

item.title: 欧元区工资增长加快，向欧洲央行发出通胀警告
item.description: 衡量欧元区工资水平的一个关键指标未能在 2024 年初放缓；这对指望通过放缓来维持通胀回落的欧洲中央银行官员来说是一个警示信号。【原文：A key gauge of euro-area wages failed to slow at the start of 2024 — a warning sign to European Central Bank officials counting on a slowdown to maintain the retreat in inflation.】

item.title: 亿万富翁税分裂七国集团，耶伦反对勒梅尔的推动
item.description: 七国集团财政官员准备齐聚意大利斯特雷萨（Stresa）召开会议，但在如何向全球最富有的个人征税的问题上，各国意见不一。【原文：Group of Seven countries are at odds over how to tax the world’s richest individuals as finance officials prepare to gather for a meeting in Stresa, Italy.】

item.title: 纽约市游客带来创纪录的 49 亿美元税收收入
item.description: 由于美国游客的激增帮助抵消了国际和商务旅行的下降，纽约市由游客带来的税收已经超过了大流行前的水平。【原文：New York City’s tax revenue generated by tourists has surpassed pre-pandemic levels as a jump in US visitors helped offset a drop in international and business travel.】

item.title: 德国写字楼市场低迷加剧，交易量创 15 年新低
item.description: 年初，德国办公楼市场继续恶化，交易量达到近 15 年来的最低点。【原文：Germany’s market for office properties continued to worsen at the beginning of the year, with deal volumes hitting the lowest point in almost 15 years.】

item.title: 印度最大垃圾债券发行商获得延期付款指令
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，印度有史以来最大的高收益卢比公司债券发行商 Goswami Infratech Pvt.【原文：Goswami Infratech Pvt., issuer of India’s biggest ever high-yield rupee corporate bond, has won a temporary reprieve from creditors on a payment that was due on the note this month, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 英国经济从衰退中复苏步伐放缓，PMI 指数低于预期
item.description: 由于服务业的活动和价格压力开始减弱，英国经济的复苏势头在 5 月份有所减弱。【原文：The UK economy’s recovery lost some momentum in May as activity and price pressures in the services sector started to fade.】

item.title: 司法部经济学家如何处理美国的反垄断问题
item.description:
分析反竞争行为的经济影响。【原文：

Analyzing the economic impact of anti-competitive behaviors.

】

item.title: 认识贝莱德的比特币信徒
item.description:
在本期万亿节目中，我们将与史上最成功的交易所交易基金

发行背后的关键人物进行对话。【原文：

On this episode of Trillions, we sit down with a key player behind the most successful exchange-traded fund launch in history.

】

item.title: 欧元区经济活动创一年新高，复苏步伐加快
item.description: 欧元区私营部门的商业活动达到一年来的最高水平--这表明该地区的经济反弹正在形成。【原文：Euro-area private-sector business activity reached its highest level in a year - suggesting the region’s economic rebound is taking hold.】

item.title: 亿万富翁标致家族面临罕见的股东反叛
item.description: 亿万富翁标致家族因持有倒闭的欧洲房地产帝国 Signa 而蒙受损失，其上市投资工具的业绩正面临前所未有的股东压力。【原文：The billionaire Peugeot family is under unprecedented shareholder pressure over the performance of its listed investment vehicle following losses related to its holdings in the collapsed European property empire Signa.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织（IMF）称法国在预算方面需要 "大量 "额外努力
item.description: 法国总统埃马纽埃尔-马克龙（Emmanuel Macron）再次收到有关该国高债务负担的警告，因为国际货币基金组织（International Monetary Fund）表示，需要做出更多努力来控制预算赤字。【原文：French President Emmanuel Macron received another warning about the country’s high debt burden as the International Monetary Fund said more efforts are needed to get budget deficits under control.】

item.title: 津巴布韦国有矿业公司称锂资产吸引投资者
item.description: 津巴布韦国有矿业公司库文巴资源有限公司（Kuvimba Resources Ltd.）表示，其锂资产正在吸引来自中国和其他国家的潜在投资者。【原文：Zimbabwe’s state-owned miner Kuvimba Resources Ltd. said its lithium assets are attracting potential investors from both China and other countries.】

item.title: 调查显示：德国企业难以获得发展动力
item.description: 据工业游说团体 DIHK 对 24,000 家公司的调查显示，由于当前商业环境恶劣，制造业尤其疲软，德国经济未能摆脱停滞状态。【原文：The German economy is failing to break out of stagnation as the current business climate is poor, with the manufacturing sector particularly weak, according to a survey of 24,000 companies by industry lobby DIHK.】

item.title: 狭路相逢 "后瑞典央行副行长邦格呼吁改革
item.description: 瑞典央行副行长艾诺-邦格（Aino Bunge）表示，瑞典需要降低其家庭和房地产公司对利率上调和其他变化的敏感度，因为瑞典在通胀肆虐期间险些陷入更加不利的局面，而目前通胀正在消退。【原文：Sweden needs to reduce its households’ and property companies’ sensitivity to higher interest rates and other changes as the nation narrowly escaped a more adverse scenario during a bout of inflation that is now subsiding, Riksbank Deputy Governor Aino Bunge said.】

item.title: 德国经济活动创一年新高，工厂低迷有所缓解
item.description: 随着德国工业萎靡不振状况的缓解，德国私营部门活动的增长速度达到一年来最快。【原文：German private-sector activity grew at the fastest pace in a year as the country’s industrial malaise abated.】

item.title: 橡树公司收购国际米兰，前亿万富翁的财富化为乌有
item.description: 橡树资本管理公司（Oaktree Capital Management）对国际米兰的收购使其前中国老板的净资产接近于零，这是这位曾经的亿万富翁庞大帝国崩溃的最后一击。【原文：Oaktree Capital Management’s takeover of Inter Milan has left its former Chinese boss with a net worth close to zero, the final blow in the collapse of the onetime billionaire’s sprawling empire.】

item.title: 天达为英国汽车金融调查预留 3,000 万英镑资金
item.description: Investec Plc 预留了 3,000 万英镑（3,800 万美元），用于支付英国监管机构正在对其汽车贷款业务进行的调查可能涉及的赔偿和其他费用。【原文：Investec Plc set aside £30 million ($38 million) to pay for possible compensation and other costs linked to UK regulators’ ongoing probe of its auto lending business.】

item.title: 即使在沙特阿拉伯，可再生能源也比化石燃料便宜
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯签署了从两个大型风力发电场购买电力的协议，其价格比天然气发电厂便宜，因为沙特阿拉伯的目标是迅速过渡到在电网中增加可再生能源的比例。【原文：Saudi Arabia signed deals to buy electricity from two large-scale wind farms that are cheaper than natural gas plants, as it aims to rapidly transition to a bigger share of renewables in the power grid.】

item.title: 丹麦总部大楼火灾被扑灭
item.description: 诺和诺德公司（Novo Nordisk A/S）丹麦总部办公楼的大火已被扑灭，这是该制药商在不到一周的时间内遭遇的第二起火灾。【原文：A fire at a Novo Nordisk A/S office building has been put out at the Danish headquarters complex, in what was the second blaze to hit the drugmaker in less than a week.】

item.title: 热浪刺激用电量，印度遭遇长时间停电
item.description: 当前的热浪使印度各地的电力需求超过了本月预计的峰值水平，因此出现了断电现象。【原文：Power outages have been recorded across India after the current heatwave pushed electricity demand beyond a peak level forecast for this month.】

item.title: 塞甘提审判移至可判处更长刑期的法庭
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，针对对冲基金 Segantii Capital Management Ltd. 及其创始人西蒙-赛德勒（Simon Sadler）的内幕交易案正在移交给香港一家级别更高的法院审理，该法院可对定罪判处更长的刑期。【原文：The insider trading case against hedge fund Segantii Capital Management Ltd. and its founder Simon Sadler is moving to a higher Hong Kong court that can hand out longer sentences for convictions, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 新加坡保险公司聘请安永就华侨银行 10 亿美元收购要约发表意见
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，大东方控股有限公司（Great Eastern Holdings Ltd.）任命安永为独立财务顾问，负责华侨银行（Oversea-Chinese Banking Corp.【原文：Great Eastern Holdings Ltd. appointed EY as independent financial adviser for the S$1.4 billion ($1 billion) offer from Oversea-Chinese Banking Corp. to buy the remaining stake the lender does not currently own, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 越南银行称越南盾跌至历史最低点，越南可能提高利率
item.description: 随着货币贬值至历史新低，越南加息呼声渐起，马来亚银行（Malayan Banking Bhd.【原文：Calls for an interest-rate hike in Vietnam are emerging, with Malayan Banking Bhd. forecasting an increase as early as this month, as the currency weakened to a record low.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长金多斯称六月降息四分之一是 "审慎之举
item.description: 欧洲中央银行副行长路易斯-德金多斯（Luis de Guindos）在接受《德国新闻报》（Oberösterreichische Nachrichten）采访时表示，下个月降息四分之一点看起来是合理的。【原文：European Central Bank Vice President Luis de Guindos said a quarter-point interest-rate cut next month looks reasonable, according to an interview with Oberösterreichische Nachrichten.】

item.title: 大波特兰寻求 3.5 亿英镑以应对伦敦写字楼荒
item.description: 大波特兰地产公司（Great Portland Estates Plc）计划通过全额包销的供股募集 3.5 亿英镑（4.45 亿美元），因为该开发商希望利用优质办公空间的短缺。【原文：Great Portland Estates Plc plans to raise £350 million ($445 million) in a fully underwritten rights issue as the developer looks to exploit a shortage of high-quality office space.】
